DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is in a prospective, consecutive series of diabetic patients with carpal tunnel syndrome, who are then age and gender matched with non-diabetic patients having idiopathic carpal tunnel syndrome to compare the clinical results after carpal tunnel release.
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis was based on clinical history and symptoms of carpal tunnel syndrome Confirmed by nerve conduction studies. Other focal nerve entrapments Cervical radiculopathy Inflammatory joint disease Renal failure Thyroid disorders Previous wrist fracture Longterm exposure to vibrating tools.
